title: Bonus art from the Junji Ito Best of Best: Short Story Collection
description:
Just like the title says this is just bonus art from the Junji Ito Best of Best: Short Story Collection.

The oneshots from the collection:
An Unearthly Love: https://cubari.moe/proxy/gist/cmF3L1lrdXpoZS9NYW5nYS9tYXN0ZXIvQW4lMjBVbmVhcnRobHklMjBMb3ZlLmpzb24/
